profile.name: Nyein Chan Toe
profile.aboutMe: Co-chair of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. Founder of Breakthrough Energy. Co-founder of Microsoft. Voracious reader. Avid traveler. Active blogger.

experience.description: Guided by the belief that every life has equal value, the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation works to help all people lead healthy, productive lives. In developing countries, it focuses on improving people’s health and giving them the chance to lift themselves out of hunger and extreme poverty. In the United States, it seeks to ensure that all people—especially those with the fewest resources—have access to the opportunities they need to succeed in school and life. Based in Seattle, Washington, the foundation is led by CEO Mark Suzman, under the direction of co-chairs Bill Gates and Melinda French Gates and the board of trustees.

At Project Stores, I've led the creation of Mobile Application, a top-tier app designed to provide users with a seamless and secure online experience. Leveraging my skills in UI/UX design, API integration, and security measures, I've developed a platform that offers real-time display, secure authentication, and hassle-free payment options. Users can effortlessly manage profiles, maintain anonymity online, and enjoy uninterrupted browsing with just a tap. My focus on user privacy and commitment to excellence has positioned as a trusted solution for those seeking enhanced online security and privacy.

experience.company: Blue Ocean Operating Management Co., Ltd.
experience.description: As a Data Entry Associate at Blue Ocean Operating Management Co., Ltd., I was responsible for accurately inputting, updating, and maintaining data within the company’s database systems, ensuring data quality and integrity through regular checks and corrections. I managed and organized records, prepared reports, and supported system updates while troubleshooting data entry issues. My role involved collaborating with various departments to gather and verify information, maintaining confidentiality of sensitive data, and contributing to process improvements for enhanced efficiency. Additionally, I provided general administrative support, including filing and scanning documents, and assisted with other office duties as needed.

volunteer.description: In my role at the company, I've been instrumental in reinventing social media for niche communities. By leveraging my skills in UI/UX design, API integration, and database management, I've contributed to creating a platform that caters specifically to the interests of anime, manga, and gaming enthusiasts. Through intuitive design and seamless integration of features like news updates and community engagement tools, we've provided a space where users can connect, discover, and stay informed about their passions. My commitment to user-centric design and continuous improvement has been key to ensuring the platform's success in serving the needs of our niche community.

project.name: Visual Studio Code
project.description: Visual Studio Code is a code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications.

project.name: TypeScript
project.description: TypeScript is a language for application-scale JavaScript. TypeScript adds optional types to JavaScript that support tools for large-scale JavaScript applications for any browser, for any host, on any OS. TypeScript compiles to readable, standards-based JavaScript.
